DOC.brief_summary: Weight loss may help psoriasis. Phototherapy helps psoriasis. Combining the two treatments may help even more. Determining if a high protein diet vs a low protein diet results in improving psoriais may help lead to future dietary effects on psoriasis therapy
DOC.brief_title: A Single-Center, Prospective, Pilot Study to Compare the Effect of Diet in Overweight or Obese Patients With Psoriasis on Light Therapy
DOC.criteria: PSA greater 10 BMI greater than 30 PSA less than 10 less than 18 years old
